files.patch:
@@ -35,1 +35,1 @@
-The library requires jtreg 4b13+ and JDK 7+.
+The library requires jtreg 4b13+ and JDK 15+.
@@ -105,1 +105,0 @@
-

@@ -38,2 +38,1 @@
-  jcmd.vm.info \
-  jstack
+  jstack jhsdb.jstack
@@ -65,0 +64,4 @@
+jhsdb.app=jhsdb
+jhsdb.jstack.args=jstack --mixed --pid %p
+jhsdb.jstack.params.repeat=6
+
@@ -67,0 +70,1 @@
+# Assume that java standard laucher has been used

@@ -34,3 +34,1 @@
-  native.stack \
-  native.jhsdb.jstack \
-  native.core
+  native.stack native.core
@@ -66,5 +64,0 @@
-native.jhsdb.app=bash
-native.jhsdb.jstack.delimiter=\0
-native.jhsdb.jstack.args=-c\0DevToolsSecurity --status | grep -q enabled && jhsdb jstack --mixed --pid %p
-native.jhsdb.jstack.params.repeat=6
-
